name: neetlogiq-v2
description: NEET Logiq - Medical College Search Platform

scripts.start:worker:minimal: cd cloudflare-workers && npx wrangler dev --config minimal-wrangler.toml --port 8784
scripts.deploy:worker:dev: cd cloudflare-workers && npx wrangler deploy --env development
scripts.deploy:worker:prod: cd cloudflare-workers && npx wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.db:migrate: cd cloudflare-workers && npx wrangler d1 migrations apply neetlogiq-db --local
scripts.db:migrate:remote: cd cloudflare-workers && npx wrangler d1 migrations apply neetlogiq-db --remote
scripts.db:backup: cd cloudflare-workers && npx wrangler d1 export neetlogiq-db --output backup.sql

author: NEET Logiq Team
